entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 30 by morning.
